title: Is the Mondrian Upside Down, or Is It an Abstract Enigma?
description: A curator concluded that a piece featuring thick, colorful tape had been hung at her museum the “wrong way around.” But it’s difficult to truly discern Mondrian’s vision for an unsigned work.
dc:creator: Julia Jacobs
media:description: According to a curator at the German museum displaying “New York City I,” the lines gathered closely at the bottom should actually be on the top.
